text: vajrO# vaShaTkAqrastriqvRuta#mEqva vajra(gm)# saqmBRutyaq BrAtRu#vyAyaq pra ha#raqtyacCa#mbaTkAra-mapaqgUryaq vaSha#TkarOtiq stRutyai# gAyaqtrI pu#rO&nuvAqkyA# Bavati triqShTug yAqjyA$ brahma#nnEqva kShaqtramaqnvAra#M Bayatiq tasmA$dbrAhmaqNO muKyOq muKyO# Bavatiq ya EqvaM ~MvEdaq praivaina#M purO&nuvAqkya#yA &&haq praNa#yati yAqjya#yA gaqmaya#ti vaShaTkAqrENaivaina#M purO&nuvAqkya#yA dattEq praya#cCati yAqjya#yAq prati# - [  ]  12
